prompt: Create a 404 Not Found page with a soft pastel pink background (Colors.pink[50]). Display '404' in bold purple (Colors.purple[700], font size 70). Show 'Page Missing' in purple (Colors.purple[500], font size 24, semi-bold). Include a message 'We couldn’t find the page you’re looking for.' in gray (Colors.grey[600], font size 16). Add a purple 'Home' button with rounded corners (borderRadius: 10) and white text. Use a Column layout with mainAxisAlignment.center and crossAxisAlignment.end, aligning content to the right. Apply padding of 28.0 on all sides. Use a Scaffold with the pastel pink background, and add a subtle border to the button (borderSide: BorderSide(color: Colors.purple[900])).
